short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pattern matching and performing actions on search results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Juniper browser tags aims to improve Juniper employee productivity by offering actions and tasks, on a webpage containing internal service/product/task patterns.
It is built to be used only for Juniper Networks employees and is meant for internal usage while inside Juniper's internal network.
